Method Detail

getRelativeLocationString

public static java.lang.String getRelativeLocationString(float distance,
                                                         float bearing,
                                                         boolean extended,
                                                         boolean useImperialUnits)
Returns relative location string from the given distance and bearing

Parameters:
distance - Distance in meters
bearing - in degrees [0,360)
extended - true if bearing should be added to the string
imperialUnits - true if distance should be converted from international system to imperial units
Returns:
Relative location string, e.g. "10.22Km NW", "200m E"

writeToFile

public static boolean writeToFile(java.io.InputStream is,
                                  java.lang.String directory,

                           throws java.io.IOException
Writes an input stream to the file at specified directory, creates directory and/or file if necessary

Parameters:
is - input stream to write to file
directory - path where file is to be written
filename - file name
Throws:
java.io.IOException

public static boolean writeToFile(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                  android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                                  int quality,
                                  java.lang.String directory,
                                  java.lang.String filename,
                                  boolean deleteOnExit)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Write a bitmap object to the specified file

Parameters:
bitmap - Bitmap object to be written
format - Compression Format
quality - Compression Quality (1-100)
directory - Directory where file is written
filename - Name of the file to be written
Returns:
true on success
Throws:
java.io.IOException

removeDirectory

public static boolean removeDirectory(java.io.File path,
                                      long timeThreshold)
Recursively removes a directory and its contents, optionally using time threshold, if time difference between last modified time and current system time is more than given threshold (in hours), the file is deleted. If the given threshold is 0, it is not used

Parameters:
path - directory path to be removed
timeThreshold - threshold in hours, not used if 0
Returns:
true on success, false on failure

getVersionCode

public static java.lang.String getVersionCode(android.content.Context context)
Get application version code

Parameters:
context - Application Context
Returns:
Version code string

readUDID

public static java.lang.String readUDID(android.content.Context context)
Get device UDID

Parameters:
context - Application context
Returns:
Device IMEI number if available, else a dummy number

                                          int len)
Splits a text in multiple lines according to words instead of chars, to draw on a canvas

Parameters:
text - Text to be split
len - Maximun lenght in chars for a sentence
Returns:
array of lines that contains the splitted text
